divs: Sighting DetailsI was on a friend's property stepping off his front porch... The sound made me aware of the object I thought the object at first was a KC-10 Extender of the US Air Force, but there were no red marker lights on the wings and no white marker lights on wing tips or tail. The object was a circular white light when compared to the stars. It dwarfed the stars. It was going straight with noise behind it and started a gentle curver from South to Southeast. My reaction during it was to try to understand weather it was or was not a UFO...After seeing the object I could not identify the object. I lost sight of the object when the object's light went dark and blended with the dark sky. It was a totally clear night sky and there were no objects obstructing my view.
Summary: Bright white object bet 35k & 70k feet with deep roar sounding like rocketry but not sounding like space shuttle
trends: There have been no other sightings in Eastern Kentucky
This sighting has never been favorited.
